My One and Only
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Poetry: My One and Only
By Kalus on Saturday, May 22, 2004 - 07:34 am:

I actually wrote this one the same day as the Killer Inside, so sorry about the rhyming a word with itself again.

When you are not here I am sad
Just one glimpse of your face will make me glad
When you leave I fall into insanity
When you return so does my sanity
My life is only worth living when you are around
My life is nothing when you are not around
I will give anything for you to be with me
Please my love don't leave me.

By CHB on Saturday, May 22, 2004 - 02:19 pm:

Well, you beat was off, and on three instances you ryhmed a word with itself.

Not horrible, and good effort, but I've definatly seen better.

By Icelord13 on Thursday, May 27, 2004 - 02:00 pm:

I'd have to agree with CHB on this one. All that needed to be said has been said. After all of these dark poems, i would really find it interesting for you to try a poem with a little more of a cheerful atmosphere.

By Kalus on Thursday, June 10, 2004 - 07:25 pm:

Might be a while till I write a poem that is not dark and morbid I am not very good at up beat happy poems. Thanks for the feedback though.
